page.title: 02Lead mining
page.content: Long ago in South Darley there was a lot of{lead mining.}The result was a lot of derelict,abandoned mine shafts. The mine roofs were held up with timber props which are now rotting.The County Council put up warnings about the danger in this area,as many are collapsing.The entrances have been capped off with concrete.Pollution is something that has happened as a result of this lead mining.The water is polluted and there are many old spoil heaps.Enthovens is a factory that used to mine lead but it only recycles and smelts lead now.It has a big chimney that gives off harmful smoke which pollutes the air.There are quite a lot of tests carried out to make sure the pollution levels do not become to high.Exhaust smoke from cars also polutes the air with lead,but there isn't much traffic in the area.
